channel.title: Kharagpur Open Source Society
channel.description: Recent content on Kharagpur Open Source Society

item.description: Freshers’ Selection How do we recruit? This should be carefully re-evaluated every year. People change, along with the needs of KOSS. Core parameters for hiring are Knowledge Will to Learn Will to Teach The parameters are given equal weight. Screening Round An online form is released with few questionnaires. We carefully go through their answers and invite potential candidates for a sit-in interview with the team.
